summary: An Ordinance relating to, and repealing, Council Bill No. 30728, entitled: "An Ordinance relating to, and prohibiting the operation of, certain kinds of "For Hire' motor vehicles, on, upon and along certain streets, alleys and other public places; regulating the operation of such vehicles upon all other streets alleys and other public places; repealing Ordinance No. 40886, and all other ordinances and parts of ordinances that conflict therewith; and providing for the submission thereof to the qualified voters of the City of Seattle for ratification or rejection," passed by the City Council on September 13, 1920.
